com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element

Class SeleniumCheckableGroupInputWebElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumWComponentWebElement
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumGroupInputWebElement
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumCheckableGroupInputWebElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext, org.openqa.selenium.TakesScreenshot, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SeleniumWCheckBoxSelectWebElement, SeleniumWRadioButtonSelectWebElement

    public abstract class SeleniumCheckableGroupInputWebElement
extends SeleniumGroupInputWebElement
    Checkable group inputs are WCheckBoxSelect and WRadioButtonSelect.
    Author:
    Mark Reeves

      • getSelected

        public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getSelected()
        Get the selected options. Note that a WCheckBoxSelect in a read only state contains only the selected options and a disabled component has no selected options.
        Returns:
        a list of selected options

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement option)
        Parameters:
        option - the WebElement representing an option in the component.
        Returns:
        true if the input in option is selected or if option exists and the component is read-only.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
